coded_answer.p: I'm so happy that I've won 2 weeks at Camp California in the U.S.A. At first I couldn't belivebelieve that I was a winerwinner
I would like to travel atto the Camp in July, if is possible. This is just one monthsmonth which I'veI have feefree.

I'm a student. My school starstsstarts in September and it finishes in June. July is the monthsmonth when I'm having a rest and I'm doing nothing. In August I'm working in thea shop which is my sistersister's. If I could go in July that would be greategrate.

I can sleep in a tent, it would remainremind me of a good time which I'dI spenthad with my friends a few years ago. I'm not scared of darkness, rain, cold or hot whetherweather. I'm sure it would be good fun; sleepsleeping next to each other telling scaredscary storystories. IsIt is good for makemaking friends, you can know them better doing everything together.

Also I know that I have the chance to do two activities while I'm at the Camp. I would like to choose basketball. This is a sport which I ,,love". I playhave been playing basketball since I was 12. Some of my friends say that I'm a very good player, but I don't think so.
Another sport which I'd like to do is swimming. InAt swimming I'm not as goodI'm not as good at swimming as I am inat basketball, but I'd like to practise more and maybe learn something new about it.
I would like to ask you, what sort of clothes shallshould I take with me? I don't want taketo take too much; jeans, jumper, swimming costiumcostume, T-shirt, sports shoes I think should bbe O.K.
KnowNow, I can justhardly wait for July

How are you? I'm fine. I'm so exitedexcited. Last month I was helping at a pop concert with a few friends of mine. It was a Tina Turner concert! ToAt this moment when I'm thinkingI think of it I want shoutto shout.

At first I was helping to seillsell the tickets - it wasn't difficult. Anyway, four hours, before the concert had started, I was helping with the lights. We had to check eveyevery plug, switch, lightslight. I couldn't belivebelieve how big thea lamp can be. That's why singers are hot. When the concert had started and Tina camcame out I forget about lights, just I wasI was just looking at her. fortunetlyfortunatelyFortunately nothing had happendhappened. Every-thingEverything was O.K
After the concert we were invited in backstage. thenThen I could see her very, very clearclearly.

JustOnly people who waswere helping and organizatingorganizing this concert could meet her. Some of them were speaking with her, I wasn't this lucky person, but still I'm happy, that I could be thearthere.
